dao.name: QRY_PSI_QUOTE_MN
dao.statement: select mn.order_nos, mn.order_dat, mn.order_sta, mn.format_sta, cust.show_cod, cust.cust_nam , mn.atten_nam, mn.order_rmk, mn.ins_usr, mn.upd_usr, mn.cnfirm_cod from psi_quote_mn mn join sec_typ_ctrl sec on mn.comp_cod = sec.comp_cod and mn.cust_cod = sec.key_cod2 left join psi_cust_mn cust on mn.cust_cod = cust.cust_cod where trim(sec.comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod) and sec.sys_cod='PSI_WEB' And sec.remark_cod='usr_cust' And trim(sec.key_cod1) = trim(:key_cod1)

dao.name: QRY_PSI_QUOTE_SINGLE_MN
dao.statement: select * from psi_quote_mn where trim(comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod) and trim(order_nos) = trim(:order_nos)

dao.name: CHK_PSI_FORMAT_STA
dao.statement: select count(*) as count from psi_quote_mn where trim(comp_cod) = trim(:comp_cod) and trim(cust_cod) = trim(:cust_cod) and order_dat = to_date(:order_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD') and trim(format_sta) = trim(:format_sta)
